name.name: type
name.label: What type of Name are you looking for?

name.name: type_of_venture
name.label: Select a category that best describes your businessAgency

name.name: what_venture_does
name.label: What does your company / business do?
name.placeholder: e.g. We're an online lifestyle brand that provides stylish and high quality apparel to the expert eco-conscious shopper.

name.name: target_customers
name.label: Tell us about your customers
name.hint: Share any relevant information such as their demographics, interests, aspirations etc.

name.name: style
name.label: What character, spirit or emotion do you want the name to convey?
name.hint: You can use adjectives such as serious, fun, professional etc

name.name: description
name.label: Any other details that are relevant to this project?
name.hint: Is there anything else that you haven't covered so far, but might be relevant to the project?
name.placeholder: Share any additional information or direction that might be useful to creatives
